newsitem.title: USA: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.
newsitem.headline: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.

text.p: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls as of 0805 CST, according to analysts.
LIVE CATTLE - Up 0.150 to off 0.100 cent. Nearbys seen up on firm cash markets, backs down on further report pressure.
FEEDER CATTLE - Steady to up 0.100 cent. Market looks oversold and corn called easier.
LEAN HOGS - Off 0.100 to 0.500 cent. Cash hogs called lower and lack of demand for wholesale product.
PORK BELLIES - Off 0.250 to 0.800 cent. Carryover from limit, delivery concerns and out-of-town expected bearish.
